title: My BF Puts His Friends First
itunes:title: My BF Puts His Friends First
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been dating a man for almost two years and he has a lot of female friends.  I hung out with all of them and at first I tried to act like a team player, but, I see has no respect for boundaries in this relationship.  He has a lot of house parties or his friends will come over and do impromptu cookouts no matter what we have planned.  He drops everything to entertain them........................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been dating a man for almost two years and he has a lot of female friends.  I hung out with all of them and at first I tried to act like a team player, but, I see has no respect for boundaries in this relationship.  He has a lot of house parties or his friends will come over and do impromptu cookouts no matter what we have planned.  He drops everything to entertain them........................
